name: @andersseen/motion
description: Framework-agnostic animation library for TypeScript and CSS

scripts.build: rm -rf dist dist-cjs && tsc && tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.json && cat src/animations/_base.css src/animations/_attention-seekers.css src/animations/_fading.css src/animations/_sliding.css src/animations/_zooming.css src/animations/_bouncing.css src/animations/_flippers.css src/animations/_rotating.css src/animations/_lightspeed.css src/animations/_back.css src/animations/_specials.css src/animations/_components.css src/animations/_reduced-motion.css > dist/style.css

author: Jules
